pets.name: Aardvark
pets.behavior: Enemy summoned: Gain +1 attack and +3 health.

pets.name: Adult Flounder
pets.behavior: Transformed: Give two back-most friends 1 experience.

pets.name: Ahuizotl
pets.behavior: End turn: Summon one level 1 Ocarina.

pets.name: Akhlut
pets.behavior: Faint: Spend 2 mana to give the nearest friend behind permanent +3 attack and +3 health.

pets.name: Albatross
pets.behavior: Adjacent tier 4 or lower friends deals 3 ability damage extra.

pets.name: Albino Squirrel
pets.behavior: Sell: Replace shop food with three random food and discount them by 1 gold.

pets.name: Amargasaurus
pets.behavior: Friend hurt: Restore its health. Can restore up to 15 health per turn.

pets.name: Amphisbaena
pets.behavior: End turn: Give the nearest friend ahead +1 attack on odd turns and +1 health on even.

pets.name: Andrewsarchus
pets.behavior: End turn: Remove the most healthy unfrozen shop pet to gain 50% of its stats until next turn.

pets.name: Angry Pygmy Hog
pets.behavior: Really angry!

pets.name: Anubis
pets.behavior: Start of battle: Activate two Faint friends from tier 2 or lower front-to-back.

pets.name: Atlantic Puffin
pets.behavior: Friendly attacked: Remove its Strawberry perk to deal 2 damage to the last enemy.

pets.name: Axehandle Hound
pets.behavior: Before any attack: If opponent has duplicates, deal 2 damage to all enemies. Works 1 time per battle.

pets.name: Baby Urchin
pets.behavior: Faint: Remove 4 health from the first enemy.

pets.name: Bakunawa
pets.behavior: Start of battle: Make the highest attack enemy Sleepy.

pets.name: Barnacle
pets.behavior: End turn: If you did not roll this turn, gain +1 experience.

pets.name: Basilisk
pets.behavior: Start of battle: Transform the nearest pet ahead to Rock with +5 health.

pets.name: Bear
pets.behavior: Faint: Give Honey perk to all pets within one space.

pets.name: Black Bear
pets.behavior: Faint: Remove 4 health from one random enemy for each food this has eaten this turn.

pets.name: Bloodhound
pets.behavior: Friend sold: Stock one copy of it. Works 1 time per turn.

toys.name: Action Figure
toys.behavior: Start of battle: Give Coconut perk to two first enemies.

toys.name: Air Palm Tree
toys.behavior: Start of battle: Give Coconut perk to the highest attack friend.

toys.name: Balloon
toys.behavior: Break: Give the front-most friend +1 attack and +1 health.

toys.name: Camera
toys.behavior: Start of battle: Remove 30% attack from the highest attack enemy.

toys.name: Candelabra
toys.behavior: Three friends bought: Break and give all friends permanent +1 attack and +1 health.

toys.name: Cash Register
toys.behavior: Break: Summon one 6/6 friend that sells for 3 gold.

toys.name: Chocolate Box
toys.behavior: Start of battle: Give +1 experience to friends and +2 experience to enemies.

toys.name: Crystal Ball
toys.behavior: Start of battle: Give the front-most friend +2 mana.

toys.name: Dice Cup
toys.behavior: Start of battle: Shuffle positions of all friends.

toys.name: Evil Book
toys.behavior: Empty front space: Summon one 6/6 Great One in battle that deals 5 damage to ALL other pets.

equipment.name: Baguette
equipment.behavior: Before attack: Remove the front-most enemy perk, once.

equipment.name: Blueberry
equipment.behavior: Prioritize this for enemy random abilities.

equipment.name: Bok Choy
equipment.behavior: Gain +3 health when this would faint, once.

equipment.name: Brussels Sprout
equipment.behavior: Block being pushed or 5 damage, once.

equipment.name: Cake
equipment.behavior: End turn: Increase sell value by 1 gold.

equipment.name: Cake Slice
equipment.behavior: Give one pet +2 attack and +2 health until next turn.
